Initially positive, but the addition of phospholipid in the confirmatory assay did not appreciably shorten the aPTT.
Inhibitor level of 23 Bethesda units indicating the presence of an acquired factor VIII inhibitor.
aPTT was 35 seconds; level of factor VIII activity was 54%.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initial aPTT was elevated; improvement noted at follow-up.

other_tests.findings: No further bleeding episodes; aPTT remains mildly elevated at 39 seconds and factor VIII level is 50 to 60% of normal.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Persistence of mildly elevated aPTT and low-to-normal level of factor VIII activity.
